reference: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics for PPIOJ and PWFSA, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) of the U.S Department of Commerce for fdd.
title: The Orange Juice Data Set
description:
Description
monthly observations from 1948-01 to 2001-06
number of observations :  642
observation :  country
country :  United States

parameters.pricefg: producer price index for finished goods
parameters.priceoj: producer price for frozen orange juice
parameters.fdd: freezing degree days (from daily minimum temperature recorded at Orlando area airports)
